p: Several minor compounds were detected only in Calabrian samples, such as α-bergamotene (S2), β-cubebene (S2), β-farnesene (S1,S3), β-selinene (S1–S3), calarene (S1,S3), germacrene D (S1,S3), manol oxide (S1–S3), and spathulenol (S1,S3). Furthermore, in S2 was detected a higher amount in myrcene, γ-muurolene, δ-cadinene, aromadendrene, and terpinolene with respect to all other samples of S. officinalis considered.
